welcome_message_body: Welcome to Carmichael, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Carmichael has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Auburn Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Auburn Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Placerville Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Placerville Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
